name: VR HENTAI PLAY
description:
All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
Have a real and naughty private space all to yourself.
Gorgeous women with big tits, sex dolls, graphic features, and sex play that feels just like you are there.
Game description:
This is a room stuffed with men's dreams. Beautiful women, SM play, shooting, POV sex, stress relief.
Nothing is forbidden. Put on the HMD and you're in the metaverse of lust.
Controls:
- The left cross key switches the movement method. (Walking mode or teleportation mode)
- You can move freely in the room. You can wreck rooms with guns and metal bats.
- This is a special room with a shooting range. You can shoot without running out of bullets. Targets also recover automatically.
- Sex dolls can move their heads and body parts and can be moved by holding their hips.
- You can reset the room to its initial state with the reset button.
